channel.title: How To Rotate An Item?
channel.description: Hey everyone! Sorry I am new to coding my server, but I really need to learn. Everyone has to start somewhere, right? OK, so I figured out how to make a portal. (Thank you) :D But now I am trying to add an NPC to stand next to the portal. I am fine with spawning the NPC, and making it talk, but it always faces one direction, South. Do I have to change something in the NpcHandler.java or client.java? Please explain and tell me how to do it. Thanks! :D

item.title: How To Rotate An Item?
item.dc:creator: @mr_luigi_77 mr luigi 77
item.description:
@mr_luigi_77 wrote:

No, not at the moment. But if you have hamachi, then read my sig. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 02:31:58 pm[/size][hr]Does anyone know how to rotate an NPC?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 03:37:52 pm[/size][hr]Nvm, figured it out, thanks for your help everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Rotate An Item?
item.dc:creator: @Rump_Ranger93 Rump Ranger93
item.description:
@Rump_Ranger93 wrote:

in the makeglobalobjects …

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) {

	makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, ####, 0, 10);

the ‘0’ is the direction they are 0 -1 -2 -3 i think. idr the ways they are just figure it out.
